DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study test efficacy 2 tablet ( twice daily ) ABT-712 , compare placebo , administer 4-week period participant moderate severe mechanical chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy ABT-712 Subjects With Moderate Severe Chronic Low Back Pain ( CLBP )
DOC.detailed_description: The study use randomize withdrawal design open label ( OL ) period prior double-blind ( DB ) period . Participants receive benefit tolerate ABT-712 OL period randomize DB period . Study drug give total 8 week , include 3 week OL , 4 week DB , 1-week DB taper . During OL period , participant take increase dos ABT-712 take 2 tablet , twice daily . During DB period , participant ABT-712 group take 2 ABT-712 tablet , twice daily throughout 4 week , participant placebo group take 2 placebo tablet twice daily .
DOC.criteria: Adult male female subject voluntarily sign informed consent Diagnosis CLBP 6 month duration Incapacitated bedridden subject Subjects history surgical invasive intervention
